mapper.select: select seat_num from reserve where screen_num=#{screen_num} and schedule_num=#{schedule_num}

choose.when: select count(distinct tp_num) from reserve where id=#{id}
choose.otherwise: select count(distinct T.tp_num) from ticketprice T, reserve R where T.tp_num=R.tp_num and R.id=#{id} and to_char(T.reg_date,'yyyy')=#{kind}

mapper.select: select count(reserve_num) from reserve where id=#{id}
select distinct tp_num from reserve where id=#{id}
select * from (select rownum R, RE.* from reserve RE where tp_num=#{tp_num} and id=#{id}) where R=1
